mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_s_subtask a LEFT JOIN tb_s_subtask_result b ON a.task_id=b.task_id AND a.phone_b=b.phone_b AND a.work_no= AND DATEDIFF ( a.create_time , '20191205' ) = 0
